seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3-5 years related work experience; title does not include senior or staff level.

job_family.evidence: Title contains "Data Engineer" and responsibilities focus on data pipelines and ingestion.

sub_specialty.evidence: Primary work is ingesting and processing data via SFTP file transfers, which are batch‑oriented; no streaming technologies mentioned.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No people‑management or team‑lead responsibilities are described; the role is focused on individual contribution.

primary_cloud.evidence: Experience with Azure Cloud is listed as a required skill.

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS and GCP are mentioned as optional/plus experience.

storage_layer.evidence: No data warehouse, lake, or lakehouse technologies are described.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Cincinnati, OH with no remote work language, implying work must be within the United States.

timezone_focus.evidence: US location (Cincinnati, OH) places the role in the Americas time zones.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Long list of must‑have hard skills (13 items) and several nice‑to‑have items indicate a stringent requirement set.
